ComicInfo.Title: Operation: Deep Freeze - Part 3: The Consequences
ComicInfo.Summary:
No one is safe in this sense-shattering conclusion to "Operation Deep Freeze!" They stole his armor and endangered his loved ones. Now, the CIA must pay for their sins?and the ramifications will reach as far as the Oval Office! But when the dust and blood settles, will X-O Manowar truly find peace?
Randy Cartier puts on the X-O ring for the first time...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:01:20. [Issue ID 37722]
